1334450.name: i want to be you
1334450.description:
Synopsis:
Alice has a unique approach to solve her cases. She likes to do mazes to keep her mind clear and focused. Crimes and Mazes will test your intelligence and observation with a mysterious narrative told by letters. Follow clues and the witness reports on this journey full of unforgettable stories.

Join Alice in her first case as a detective in the small but busy city of Belo Montes in the interior of Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil.

Features:
- Short story with great characters;
- Immersive;
- Game about police investigation with mazes.
- 36 letters that will help you understand the case.
- 25 hand-made levels for you to solve.
- 5 worlds with beautiful pixel art.
